question.text:
Match the items in column-A and column-B and choose the correct answer.
 
  Column-A   Column-B
(i) Ladybird beetle A Methanobacterium
(ii) Mycorrhiza B Trichoderma
(iii) Biological control C Aphids
(iv) Biogas D Glomus

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></math>

solution.text: Ladybird is used to get rid of aphids. Fungal genus Glomus forms mycorrhizal association. Trichoderma a soil-borne fungus and is used to control other fungal pathogens; thus, it is used as a biocontrol agent.
